profile.importMineboxApi.title: Import from Minebox API
profile.importMineboxApi.description: Fills your professions Level & XP from the official Minebox API.
profile.importMineboxApi.info: It is possible that your levels are not correct, as profession XP gained via collections is not included in the returned data.
profile.importMineboxApi.settings: You need to have enabled the Web API in your Minebox account settings for this to work (/settings in-game).
